ing: 1/4 medium head green cabbage, thinly sliced
des: "This is an extremely easy soup to make. It freezes very well, so you can double or triple the recipe and keep it in the freezer."
ins: Combine the carrots, potatoes, onion, cabbage, garlic, chicken stock, olive oil, thyme, basil, parsley, salt, and pepper in a stock pot over medium-high heat; bring to a simmer and cook until the carrots are tender, about 20 minutes. Transfer to a blender in small batches and blend until smooth.
